recipes.name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
recipes.ingredients:
2 slices whole grain bread
1 avocado
2 eggs
1 tsp lemon juice
Salt and pepper to taste
Red pepper flakes (optional)
recipes.instructions:
Toast the bread slices until crispy.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Poach the eggs by boiling water and gently lowering eggs into the water for 3-4 minutes.
Spread avocado on toast, top with poached eggs, and sprinkle with red pepper flakes.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup plain Greek yogurt
1/2 cup granola
1/2 cup mixed berries
1 tbsp honey
1 tsp chia seeds
recipes.instructions:
Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and berries in a cup or bowl.
Drizzle honey over the top and sprinkle chia seeds.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.ingredients:
2 grilled chicken breasts
4 cups mixed greens
1/2 cucumber, sliced
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes
1/4 cup red onion, sliced
2 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp balsamic vinegar
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Grill the chicken breasts until fully cooked and slice them.
Mix the greens, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and onion in a large bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Toss the salad with the dressing and top with sliced grilled chicken.

recipes.name: Quinoa & Black Bean Bowl
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 cup quinoa
1 cup black beans (canned or cooked)
1/2 avocado, diced
1/2 red bell pepper, diced
1/4 cup corn
1 tbsp lime juice
1 tbsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
In a large bowl, combine quinoa, black beans, avocado, bell pepper, and corn.
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice, then toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
recipes.ingredients:
2 salmon fillets
1 bunch asparagus, trimmed
2 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp lemon juice
1 tsp garlic powder
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Preheat grill to medium heat
Brush salmon and asparagus with olive oil, then season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Grill salmon for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Grill asparagus for 4-5 minutes, turning occasionally.
Drizzle salmon and asparagus with lemon juice before serving.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
recipes.ingredients:
200g firm tofu, cubed
1 cup broccoli florets
1 red bell pepper, sliced
1 carrot, julienned
1 tbsp soy sauce
1 tbsp sesame oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp ginger, grated
recipes.instructions:
Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add tofu cubes and cook until golden, about 5 minutes.
Remove tofu and add garlic, ginger, broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot to the pan.
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, then add tofu back in.
Drizzle with soy sauce and toss to coat before serving.

recipes.name: Apple Slices with Almond Butter
recipes.ingredients:
1 apple, sliced
2 tbsp almond butter
recipes.instructions:
Slice the apple into wedges.
Serve with almond butter for dipping.

recipes.name: Trail Mix Energy Bites
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 cup rolled oats
1/4 cup peanut butter
1/4 cup dried cranberries
1/4 cup sunflower seeds
1 tbsp honey
recipes.instructions:
Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl until well combined
Roll into bite-sized balls and refrigerate for 10 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Kale & Quinoa Salad
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 cup cooked quinoa
2 cups kale, chopped
1/4 cup almonds, sliced
1/4 cup dried cranberries
2 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp lemon juice
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Massage kale with olive oil and lemon juice for 2-3 minutes.
In a large bowl, mix quinoa, massaged kale, almonds, and cranberries.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.name: Baked Chicken with Sweet Potato
recipes.ingredients:
2 chicken breasts
2 medium sweet potatoes
1 tbsp olive oil
1 tsp paprika
1 tsp garlic powder
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Rub chicken with olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Peel and cube sweet potatoes, tossing them in olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Bake chicken and sweet potatoes for 30-35 minutes or until fully cooked.

recipes.name: Chickpea Salad Wrap
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup canned chickpeas, drained
1/4 cup diced celery
1/4 cup diced cucumber
2 tbsp vegan mayo
Salt and pepper to taste
2 large lettuce leaves
recipes.instructions:
Mash the chickpeas with a fork.
Mix in celery, cucumber, vegan mayo, salt, and pepper.
Spoon the chickpea mixture onto the lettuce leaves and wrap.

recipes.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 cup quinoa, cooked
1/2 cup chickpeas
1/2 cup steamed broccoli
1/4 avocado, sliced
1 tbsp tahini
1 tbsp lemon juice
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Layer quinoa, chickpeas, broccoli, and avocado in a bowl.
Drizzle with tahini and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Lentil and Veggie Stir-Fry
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 cup cooked lentils
1 bell pepper, sliced
1 cup spinach
1/4 cup carrots, julienned
1 tbsp soy sauce
1 tbsp sesame oil
1 clove garlic, minced
recipes.instructions:
Heat sesame oil in a pan and add garlic.
Add bell pepper, spinach, and carrots, and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Stir in lentils and soy sauce, and cook until warm.

recipes.name: Green Smoothie Bowl
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup spinach
1 banana
1/2 avocado
1/2 cup almond milk
1 tbsp chia seeds
recipes.instructions:
Blend spinach, banana, avocado, and almond milk until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with chia seeds.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken with Roasted Vegetables
recipes.ingredients:
2 chicken breasts
1 cup broccoli florets
1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced
1 tbsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Preheat grill and cook chicken breasts until done, about 6 minutes per side.
Roast broccoli and bell pepper with olive oil, salt, and pepper at 400°F for 15 minutes.
Serve chicken with roasted vegetables.

recipes.name: Turkey Meatballs with Zucchini Noodles
recipes.ingredients:
200g ground turkey
1/4 cup breadcrumbs
1 egg
1 tsp Italian seasoning
2 zucchinis, spiralized
recipes.instructions:
Mix turkey, breadcrumbs, egg, and seasoning, and form into meatballs.
Bake meatballs at 375°F for 20 minutes.
Saute zucchini noodles in a pan for 2-3 minutes and serve with meatballs.

recipes.name: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 cup quinoa, cooked
2 bell peppers
1/4 cup black beans, drained
1/4 cup corn kernels
1/4 cup diced tomatoes
1 tsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
1 tbsp chopped parsley
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove the seeds.
Mix cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, tomatoes, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Stuff the bell peppers with the quinoa mixture.
Place the peppers in a baking dish and cover with foil.
Bake for 25 minutes, then remove foil and bake for an additional 5 minutes.
Garnish with parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Tofu Scramble
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 block firm tofu
1/4 cup bell pepper, diced
1/4 cup onion, diced
1 tsp turmeric
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Crumble tofu with hands.
Saute bell pepper and onion until soft.
Add tofu and turmeric, and cook for 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Lentil and Spinach Soup
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 cup dry lentils, rinsed
4 cups vegetable broth
1 cup spinach leaves
1/4 cup diced carrots
1/4 cup diced celery
1/4 cup diced onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp cumin
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
In a pot, sauté onion, carrot, and celery until soft, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cumin, and cook for another minute.
Pour in vegetable broth and lentils, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes or until lentils are tender.
Stir in spinach and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.name: Avocado and Egg Salad
recipes.ingredients:
2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
1 avocado, diced
1/4 cup diced cucumber
1 tbsp lemon juice
Salt and pepper to taste
1 tbsp chopped chives
recipes.instructions:
In a bowl, combine chopped eggs, avocado, and cucumber.
Drizzle with lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper.
Gently mix ingredients together, then top with chives before serving.

recipes.name: Blueberry Chia Pudding
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup unsweetened almond milk, or milk of choice
½ cup frozen or fresh blueberries, plus more for topping
2 teaspoons maple syrup, plus more as needed
½ teaspoon vanilla extract
3 Tablespoons chia seeds
recipes.instructions:
Add milk, blueberries, maple syrup and vanilla to a blender and blend until smooth and combined.
Add blueberry milk to a mason jar and stir in chia seeds. Let sit for 5 minutes then stir the mixture
again to get out any clumps that may have formed. Place mixture in the fridge to set, at least 30 minutes but up to 12 hours.
When ready to enjoy, top with fresh blueberries and granola.

recipes.name: Poke Bowl
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup cooked sushi rice, short grain white or brown rice, served warm
½ lb sushi grade Ahi tuna, cut into ½ inch cubes
¼ cup reduced sodium tamari, soy sauce or coconut aminos
1 Tablespoon fresh lime juice
1 teaspoon sesame oil
1 mango, chopped into ½ cubes
1 cup cucumber, chopped
1 jalapeno pepper, sliced
2 green onions, chopped
1 avocado, sliced
½ cup radishes, thinly sliced
¼ cup seaweed salad
Black sesame seeds, for topping
3 Tablespoons mayo
1 teaspoon Sriracha
recipes.instructions:
Whisk together tamari, lime juice and sesame oil in a small mixing bowl. Add
chopped tuna and mix so that all of the pieces are coated in the sauce. Place in
the fridge to marinate for 5-10 minutes while you prep the veggies and sauce.
Whisk together mayo and sriracha in a small bowl. Add water as needed to reach desired consistency. Set aside.
Add ½ cup cooked rice to two bowls and top each bowl with tuna, cucumber,
mango, jalapeno, green onions, avocado, radishes and seaweed salad. Drizzle
on sriracha mayo and sprinkle with black sesame seeds. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Shakshuka
recipes.ingredients:
2 Tablespoons olive oil
1 large onion, chopped
1 orange bell pepper, chopped
4 cloves garlic, minced
½ teaspoon cumin
½ teaspoon paprika
¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper
1-2 teaspoons curry powder
¼ teaspoon turmeric
½ teaspoon sea salt
¼ teaspoon ground pepper
28 ounce can diced tomatoes
4-5 eggs
½ cup feta cheese
fresh cilantro and parsley, for serving
recipes.instructions:
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, bell pepper and garlic to
the skillet and cook until onions are soft and fragrant — about 5 to 10 minutes.
Add cumin, paprika, cayenne, curry, turmeric, salt and pepper. Give the mixture a stir and cook for about 1 minute more.
Add diced tomatoes to the skillet and bring sauce to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer and cook until the sauce thickens up a bit,
about 10 minutes. Add feta cheese to the tomato mixture and stir.
Crack eggs into tomato sauce. You should be able to fit 4-5 eggs in a large skillet.
Cover and let the eggs cook for about 5 minutes, or until the egg whites are completely cooked through.
Remove skillet from heat, uncover and let sit for a 1-2 minutes before serving.
Spoon 1-2 eggs along with a big serving of tomato sauce on to each plate.
Garnish with extra feta cheese and fresh cilantro and parsley. Serve with toast,
veggies or over a whole grain like quinoa or brown rice for a complete meal.

recipes.name: Vegan Lentil Tacos
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup cooked lentils
1/4 cup diced onion
1/4 cup diced bell pepper
1 tsp olive oil
1 tsp taco seasoning
4 corn tortillas
1/4 cup shredded lettuce
1/4 cup diced tomatoes
recipes.instructions:
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add onion and bell pepper, cook until softened.
Add cooked lentils and taco seasoning, stir to combine.
Spoon lentil mixture into corn tortillas and top with shredded lettuce and tomatoes.

recipes.name: Turkey and Sweet Potato Skillet
recipes.ingredients:
200g ground turkey
1 medium sweet potato, diced
1/2 bell pepper, diced
1/4 cup diced onion
1 tbsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
1/2 tsp paprika
1/4 tsp garlic powder
recipes.instructions:
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add ground turkey and cook until browned.
Add sweet potato, bell pepper, onion, salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder.
Cover and cook for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sweet potato is tender.

recipes.name: Almond Butter Banana Bites
recipes.ingredients:
1 banana, sliced
2 tbsp almond butter
1 tbsp chia seeds
recipes.instructions:
Slice the banana into rounds.
Spread almond butter onto one side of each banana slice and sprinkle with chia seeds.
Place another banana slice on top to make a sandwich.

recipes.name: Chicken and Avocado Salad
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup cooked, diced chicken breast
1 avocado, diced
1 cup mixed greens
1/2 cucumber, sliced
1 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp lemon juice
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
In a bowl, combine chicken, avocado, mixed greens, and cucumber.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Toss gently and serve.

recipes.name: Protein-Packed Hummus Snack
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 cup hummus
1/2 cup sliced cucumber
1/2 cup baby carrots
1/4 cup cherry tomatoes
recipes.instructions: Arrange sliced cucumber, baby carrots, and cherry tomatoes on a plate with hummus for dipping.

recipes.name: Egg and Veggie Breakfast Muffins
recipes.ingredients:
4 eggs
1/4 cup diced bell pepper
1/4 cup spinach, chopped
Salt and pepper to taste
1/4 tsp onion powder
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a muffin tin.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, bell pepper, spinach, salt, pepper, and onion powder.
Pour the mixture into muffin tin, filling each cup halfway.
Bake for 15 minutes or until eggs are set.

recipes.name: Lentil and Sweet Potato Stew
recipes.ingredients:
1/2 cup green or brown lentils, rinsed
1 medium sweet potato, diced
1/2 cup diced carrots
1/2 cup diced celery
1/2 cup diced onion
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 cup vegetable broth
1 cup water
1/2 tsp ground cumin
1/2 tsp smoked paprika
Salt and pepper to taste
1 tbsp olive oil
1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley
recipes.instructions:
In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat and sauté the onions, carrots, and celery for 5 minutes, until softened.
Add minced garlic, cumin, and smoked paprika, and cook for another minute until fragrant.
Stir in lentils, sweet potato, vegetable broth, and water.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and let simmer for 30-35 minutes, until lentils and sweet potatoes are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and garnish with chopped parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Chickpea and Spinach Curry
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup chickpeas, cooked
2 cups fresh spinach
1 small onion, diced
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp ginger, grated
1 tsp curry powder
1/2 tsp turmeric
1/2 cup coconut milk
1 tbsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat and sauté onions until translucent.
Add garlic, ginger, curry powder, and turmeric, cooking for another minute.
Add chickpeas and coconut milk, stirring to combine.
Simmer for 10 minutes, then add spinach and cook until wilted. Season to taste.

recipes.name: Overnight Oats with Berries
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup rolled oats
2 cups almond milk
1 cup mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)
1 tbsp chia seeds
1 tbsp maple syrup (optional)
1/2 tsp vanilla extract
recipes.instructions:
In a bowl, combine oats, almond milk, chia seeds, and vanilla extract.
Stir well and add maple syrup if desired.
Divide the mixture into two jars and top with mixed berries.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.

recipes.name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
recipes.ingredients:
2 medium zucchinis, spiralized
1/2 cup pesto
1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
1 tbsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add zucchini noodles and cook for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened.
Stir in pesto and cherry tomatoes, cooking for another 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Tacos
recipes.ingredients:
2 small sweet potatoes, cubed
1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
4 corn tortillas
1 avocado, sliced
1/2 tsp cumin
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss sweet potatoes with olive oil, cumin, salt, and pepper. Roast for 25 minutes.
Heat tortillas in a pan until warm.
Assemble tacos with roasted sweet potatoes, black beans, and avocado.

recipes.name: Lentil Soup
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup lentils, rinsed
1 carrot, diced
1 onion, diced
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 cups vegetable broth
1 tsp cumin
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
In a pot, sauté onion, garlic, and carrot until soft.
Add lentils, vegetable broth, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are tender.

recipes.name: Avocado and Tomato Salad
recipes.ingredients:
1 ripe avocado, diced
2 medium tomatoes, diced
1/4 red onion, thinly sliced
2 tbsp olive oil
Juice of 1 lemon
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
In a bowl, combine avocado, tomatoes, and red onion.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, then season with salt and pepper.
Toss gently and serve.

recipes.name: Spinach and Feta Omelette
recipes.ingredients:
4 eggs
2 cups fresh spinach, chopped
1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled
1 tbsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
In a bowl, whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add spinach and sauté until wilted.
Pour in the eggs and cook until the edges start to set.
Sprinkle feta cheese on one half and fold the omelette over. Cook for another minute.

recipes.name: Turkey and Spinach Wrap
recipes.ingredients:
4 whole wheat tortillas
1 lb turkey breast, sliced
2 cups fresh spinach
1/2 avocado, sliced
1 tomato, sliced
Mustard or hummus for spreading
recipes.instructions:
Spread mustard or hummus on each tortilla.
Layer turkey, spinach, avocado, and tomato on top.
Roll the tortilla tightly and slice in half to serve.

recipes.name: Roasted Vegetable Quinoa Bowl
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup quinoa, cooked
1 zucchini, diced
1 bell pepper, diced
1 red onion, diced
1 cup cherry tomatoes
2 tbsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss zucchini, bell pepper, red onion, and cherry tomatoes in olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread vegetables on a baking sheet and roast for 25 minutes.
Serve roasted veggies over quinoa.

recipes.name: Chia Seed Pudding
recipes.ingredients:
1/4 cup chia seeds
1 cup almond milk
1 tbsp maple syrup (optional)
1/2 tsp vanilla extract
Fresh fruit for topping
recipes.instructions:
In a bowl, combine chia seeds, almond milk, maple syrup, and vanilla extract.
Stir well and let sit for 10 minutes, then stir again to prevent clumping.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Serve topped with fresh fruit.

recipes.name: Overnight Oats with Almonds and Berries
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup rolled oats
2 cups almond milk
1/4 cup sliced almonds
1 cup mixed berries
1 tbsp maple syrup (optional)
1/2 tsp vanilla extract
recipes.instructions:
In a jar, combine oats, almond milk, maple syrup, and vanilla extract.
Stir in sliced almonds and mixed berries.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
In the morning, stir and enjoy.

recipes.name: Chickpea Salad Sandwich
recipes.ingredients:
1 can chickpeas, rinsed and drained
2 tbsp vegan mayo
1/4 cup diced celery
1/4 cup diced red onion
1 tbsp lemon juice
Salt and pepper to taste
4 slices whole grain bread
recipes.instructions:
In a bowl, mash chickpeas with a fork.
Mix in vegan mayo, celery, red onion, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the chickpea mixture on whole grain bread and serve.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.ingredients:
2 large bell peppers, halved and seeds removed
1 cup cooked brown rice
1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 cup corn kernels
1 tsp cumin
Salt and pepper to taste
1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, mix brown rice, black beans, corn, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Stuff the mixture into halved bell peppers.
Place peppers in a baking dish and cover with foil. Bake for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry
recipes.ingredients:
1 head cauliflower, grated into rice-sized pieces
1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, bell peppers)
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 tbsp soy sauce or tamari
2 tbsp sesame oil
1 green onion, sliced
recipes.instructions:
Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and mixed vegetables, sauté until tender.
Stir in cauliflower rice and soy sauce, cooking for another 5-7 minutes.
Garnish with green onions and serve.

recipes.name: Peach and Walnut Salad
recipes.ingredients:
4 cups mixed greens
2 ripe peaches, sliced
1/4 cup walnuts, chopped
2 tbsp balsamic vinaigrette
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, peach slices, and walnuts.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette and toss gently.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve.

recipes.name: Almond Butter Banana Toast
recipes.ingredients:
2 slices whole grain bread
4 tbsp almond butter
1 banana, sliced
1 tbsp honey (optional)
Cinnamon for sprinkling
recipes.instructions:
Toast the bread slices.
Spread almond butter evenly on each slice.
Top with banana slices, drizzle with honey, and sprinkle with cinnamon.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Nuts
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups Greek yogurt
2 tbsp honey
1/4 cup mixed nuts, chopped
1/2 tsp cinnamon
recipes.instructions:
In a bowl, layer Greek yogurt.
Drizzle with honey and top with mixed nuts and cinnamon.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Savory Oatmeal with Spinach and Egg
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup rolled oats
2 cups water or vegetable broth
1 cup fresh spinach
2 eggs
1 tbsp olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
recipes.instructions:
In a pot, bring water or broth to a boil, then add oats. Cook for about 5 minutes.
In a skillet, heat olive oil and sauté spinach until wilted. Season with salt and pepper.
Fry eggs to your preference.
Serve oatmeal topped with spinach and a fried egg.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato and Chickpea Salad
recipes.ingredients:
1 large sweet potato, diced
1 can chickpeas, rinsed and drained
2 cups mixed greens
2 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp balsamic vinegar
Salt and pepper to taste
1/4 tsp paprika
recipes.instructions:
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss sweet potato with olive oil, salt, pepper, and paprika. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 25 minutes.
In a large bowl, combine roasted sweet potato, chickpeas, and mixed greens.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar before serving.

recipes.name: Egg and Avocado Breakfast Wrap
recipes.ingredients:
4 large eggs
1 avocado, mashed
2 whole wheat tortillas
1/4 cup salsa
Salt and pepper to taste
1 tbsp olive oil
recipes.instructions:
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and scramble the eggs. Season with salt and pepper.
Warm the tortillas in another skillet or microwave.
Spread mashed avocado on each tortilla, add scrambled eggs, and top with salsa.
Wrap tightly and serve.
